      • observe

        public <any> observe()
        Description copied from interface: UserAccountManager
        UserInfo changes Observable.

        This is an infinite Observable - onComplete() and onError() will never be called.

        Note: This call will not perform any network requests.

        Specified by:
        observe in interface UserAccountManager
        Returns:
        UserInfo observable.
